Title: The Morgue
Writer: Sam Raimi (based on the characters created by), Sam Raimi (developed for television by), Ivan Raimi (developed for television by), Tom Spezialy (developed for television by), William Bromell (story editor), Cameron Welsh
Actors: Bruce Campbell, Ray Santiago, Dana DeLorenzo, Lucy Lawless
Plot: Pablo's grasp on reality is tested when Ruby reveals the Necronomicon has gifted him premonitions. Meanwhile, Ash and Kelly discover Brock's date might not be the warm body he's banking on.
